scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Matthew writing in a book, seated at a desk. An angel, likely the Angel Gabriel, stands behind him, appearing to inspire or guide his writing. The interior space is characterized by a brick wall and a checkered floor. Through an open doorway, a landscape is visible with a river, rolling hills, and a castle in the distance. Another figure, possibly a disciple or an observer, is seen looking out from the doorway into the landscape. The scene is framed by an ornate arch with decorative elements.
